review.reviewBody: Tandoori Chicken was fantastic, especially made freshly I loved the taste the combined with everything! I love the sauce and I love how the onion had no strong, only sweet taste! Perfect! Their Achari is amazing as well if you're looking for something similar as the tandoori chicken pizza 10/10

Very less cheese and toppings. Tasteless and expensive pizza  compared to the daily  deals available at other major brands like Domino's or Pizza Hut. The store should stop ripping off in the name of halal pizza.
Chicken don't have a balanced flavour, the are too sour, cooked nicely but the pizza is remarkable
Awesome pizza .. .. more jalpenos n definetly if u cud  add banana peppers
Flavour of toppings were delicious. I wish the dough had some flavour as well.
